bio: This ship fishes for souls of the dead in the river of the Inferno. If it finds you, you'll be stuck in its perfectly aimed net.

soultimate.name: Ferryman Shanty
soultimate.description: Hit foes with a giant waterfall for big damage.

skill.effect: Increases damage of Water Element attacks by 25%.
skill.name: Infernal Waters

name: Styx Mk.VI
